Augusta-Richmond_County.Curtis Baptist High School:
Curtis Baptist School (CBS) is a 1-A high school located in Augusta, Georgia, United States. It is a private school that has more than 300 students in the elementary, middle, and high school combined. The school colors are red and white and the school mascot is "Curty the Crusader."


== Mission statement ==
"At Curtis Baptist School, the mission is to infuse a Biblical worldview in all areas of academics, fine arts, and athletics developing bold and devoted followers of Jesus Christ."


== History ==
The daycare and elementary (K – 6th grade) were established in 1964 by the church.
